cardflowFree.question: Is Cardflow free?
cardflowFree.answer: Yes! Cardflow is entirely free to use. Cardflow does not charge you registration or transaction fees.

createListing.question: How do I create a listing?
createListing.answer:
To create a listing, go to the new listing page. Type in the name of your card in the text field and select the specific set of your card. Afterwards, select the quality of the card via the dropdown menu and use the text fields to choose the amount of cards you want to sell and the price per unit.

Please note that only registered users can create listings. If you do not have an account, you can register for free.

trading.question: How do I trade?
trading.answer: Trading is a planned feature that is currently unavailable. Stay tuned for updates!

deleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer:
To delete your account, navigate to your profile settings page and navigate to the bottom, where you will find a red-colored section. Afterwards, click the "Delete Account" button and your account will be permanently deleted.

Please note that this action is irreversible and any data associated with you will be lost! Because of this, please proceed with caution.

listingExpiration.question: Order information
listingExpiration.answer:
1. Marking order as "Received": An order can be marked as "Received" only if it was previously marked as "Sent" by the seller.
  2. Marking order as "Not Received": An order can be marked as "Not Received" by the buyer after at least 10 days from the order placement.
  3. Marking order as "Sent": The seller can mark the order as "Sent".
  4. Marking order as "Rejected": The seller has the right to reject an order. This can happen by marking it as "Rejected". Orders marked with "Sent" cannot be rejected.
  5. Auto-completing orders: Orders with status "Sent" will be auto-marked as "Received" by the system. Orders with status "Ordered" (which means that the seller has not sent the package yet) will be auto-marked as "Not Sent" by the system.
  6. Leaving a review: Buyers can leave a review to the seller only if the order was received.
  7. Delivery address policy after checkout: Delivery address cannot be changed after checkout.

reportingABug.question: How do I report a bug?
reportingABug.answer:
You can either contact us or raise an issue on our GitHub repository. Note that the latter option requires a GitHub account.

Please be as detailed and specific as possible when reporting a bug. This will help us address it more easily.
